descriptionHtml: has anyone noticed that there is not much blood potions well... with this mod, i put a chest just in the castle courtyard it has 35000 blood potions that should be plenty to keep you happy.  i could have added more but keep it at 35000 lol just thought if anyone noticed enjoy :D if you peopel are wondering why no image its because im just having abit of trouble uploading images the location is in the castle courtyard its not hard to find please comment on this page so i can assist you.
author: dino619
